# Vigilante

## Overview
This program will read in a single line of Vigenere cipher-text and attempt to decrypt it using frequency analysis. The best guess for a key and the plain text will be written to stdout.

## Usage
This program was written for Python 2.7, but could probably work in Python 3.x with minimal modifications.

To use: `python vigilante.py`

Then type in your Vigenere cipher-text (A-Z, no spaces, all caps) and press enter.

## Example

The following is an example of cipher text that can be broken:

``
